english.segment1: There's a big time coming. It's got me running out. When they all talk something. I still get nothing out
english.segment2: No major awards. Well that's not fair
english.segment3: There's a big time coming. I think I just ran out. Cause they all talk something. I still get nothing out
english.segment4: No major awards. Well that's not fair
english.segment5: Who cares about your what ifs?. We're music sheriffs. We've got nothing here
english.segment6: Who cares about your what ifs?. We're music sheriffs. I stab the bull, should stand still
english.segment7: Who cares about your what ifs?. We're music sheriffs. We've got nothing here
english.segment9: There's a big time coming. I think the word is out
